alert.note: Alert for Caswell; Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 1:27PM EST until January 11 at 12:26PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Blacksburg VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina...Virginia... Dan River near the City of Danville, as well as Rockingham, Caswell and Pittsylvania Counties. Dan River at Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County. Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County. For the Dan River...including Danville, Dan River at Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River near STP near Danville. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Flooding begins to affect Riverside shopping center. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 6.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 24.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - For flooding safety information, please visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 130 AM EST.
